long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A global dark theme for the web.

Dark Mode is an extension that helps you quickly turn the screen (browser) to dark at night time.

Toolbar button serves as an Turn ON / OFF switch which enables you to easily and quickly turn the extension ON or OFF.
